General ASH12USCCW 1 Ton Split Non-Inverter AC

The General ASH12USCCW 1 Ton Split AC provides a better interior environment by ensuring that the air you breathe is pure and free of contaminants through its Super Air Purifying System. With a 5-star energy rating, this energy-efficient model keeps you comfortable while consuming less energy and lessening your environmental impact. The General ASH12USCCW 1 Ton Split Air Conditioner efficiently maintains your preferred temperature even in the sweltering heat thanks to its 12000 BTU cooling capacity. Its power airflow twin flaps and Coanda airflow technology maximize air distribution, providing consistent cooling in every part of the room. Additionally, the General ASH12USCCW 1 Ton Split Air Conditioner's anti-corrosion treatment for the heat exchange fins and outside unit extends the system's lifespan, making it dependable and resilient in a range of weather situations. Operating on a single phase, 220-240 volt power supply at 50 hertz, it provides flexibility for various electrical configurations. The unit's environmentally responsible design is enhanced by its rotary compressor and usage of environmentally friendly R410A refrigerant. Additionally, the inside unit emits < 32 dB, while the outdoor unit emits ≤ 40 dB, meaning that noise levels are maintained to a minimum to ensure a calm atmosphere.
